Html: I have downloaded the CSActiveX project and successfully built it using VS 2008.  The object loads and works in a Visual Studio 2008 MFC application.  When I attempt to use the object in a Visual Studio .NET 2003 MFC application, the IDE informs me that the object is not registered on my machine.  What must I do in order for this object to work in Visual Studio .NET 2003?
Can someone please provide some assistance?  The CSActiveX project works in a Visual Studio 2008 MFC application but not in a Visual Studio 2003 MFC application.  Why is that?
